articles.title: Highlights | England v Barbarians at Twickenham - England Rugby
articles.description: In the warm-up match ahead of England's tour to Australia, a star-studded Barbarians side run in eight tries at Twickenham.

articles.content: Arsenal, Chelsea, Tottenham, West Ham and Crystal Palace have all been invited to enter their Under-21 sides into the Papa John's Trophy for the 2022/23 season. Each of the London sides have been all… [+1785 chars]

articles.title: Chelsea: Antonio Rudiger unveiled as a Real Madrid player and reveals he turned down Barcelona - Daily Mail
articles.description: Los Blancos confirmed the move over two weeks ago, but Rudiger has been away on international duty so has only now arrived in Madrid to be presented to the media at the club's training complex.
articles.content:
Antonio Rudiger has been officially unveiled as a Real Madrid player following his move from Chelsea. 
The centre-back has agreed a four-year deal at the Bernabeu after leaving the Blues at the end … [+2609 chars]
